code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import web3 from'../SC/web3';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../css_files/manufacturer.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ManufacturerDashboard=()=>{const[userAddress,setUserAddress]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchAccount=async()=>{const accounts=await web3.eth.getAccounts();if(accounts.length>0){setUserAddress(accounts[0]);}else{console.error("No accessible accounts.
